inclusion.criterion: treated with any drug submitted via intravenous cannula
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: subject has a maximum ASA-2 score
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: allergic to amide group local anesthetics
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: the subject has a dermatological disease
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: 34-year-old African American man with known history of Sickle cell disease, severe bone pain, and positive history of sickle cell crises since childhood.
